title: 'Perfect anti skid slippers!'
body: 'Finally got proper antiskid slippers from Bata. The texture is so smooth and very comfortable while walking. Safe for walking on slippery surface. Going with the reviews I ordered one size up(7) for comfortable feel at the straps. Colour looks same as in picture. Thank you Bata and Amazon!'

title: 'Reliable but..'
body: 'Got this for my Mom as I have been using the same slipper and I enjoy wearing it. The only problem remain is the Fit. My Mom wears size 7 BUT I had to order size 6 for her to be fit. So I would suggest for a size smaller.  Comfort 4/5 Grip 5/5 Wet grip 4/5 Softness 4.5/5'
